text: Las Ketchup is a Spanish girl group founded by flamenco record producer Manuel "Queco" Ruiz. The group has sisters Lucía, Lola, and Pilar Muñoz (later to be joined by a fourth sister Rocío), is best known for the 2002 hit single, "The Ketchup Song (Aserejé)", a single that sold over seven million copies worldwide. The group's debut studio album Hijas del Tomate, has sold over two million copies worldwide. They represented Spain at Eurovision Song Contest 2006 in Athens with the song "Un Blodymary". title: Las Ketchup
